coreAttributes.name: arcanist's staff
coreAttributes.description: A wooden staff, the crude design of which leads you to believe that it has been re-purposed from a different arcane weapon. Although lacking in refinement, it seems powerful enough...
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: [npc.verb(Channel)] the power of the arcane through [npc.his] staff's power to shoot a bolt of energy at [npc2.name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.her] staff, and [npc.verb(prepare)] to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Harnessing the power of the arcane, [npc.name] [npc.verb(materialise)] a bolt of arcane energy around [npc.her] staff, before shooting it to strike [npc2.name]!
Pointing [npc.her] staff at [npc2.name], a bolt of arcane energy materialises before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name]!
As [npc.name] [npc.verb(raise)] [npc.his] staff, a bolt of arcane energy materialises itself before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name]!

missDescriptions.missText: Harnessing the power of the arcane, [npc.name] [npc.verb(materialise)] a bolt of arcane energy around [npc.her] staff, before shooting it to strike [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!

Pointing [npc.her] staff at [npc2.name], a bolt of arcane energy materialises before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
As [npc.name] [npc.verb(raise)] [npc.his] staff, a bolt of arcane energy materialises itself before shooting itself forward to strike [npc2.name], but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
